visualization_prompt: Generate a dotplot showing monthly inventory transactions using categorical stacking
visualization_explanation: This dotplot visualizes categorical inventory data across three months. The dataset contains two discrete numerical series (purchase/sale counts) against three categorical time periods. Synthetic data maintains integer counts with logical purchase > sale relationship. The dotplot format maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating redundant axes while Cairo's principles ensure immediate recognition of transaction disparities through position encoding. Stacked dots (μ=2.33 purchases, μ=1 sale) create intuitive magnitude comparison without numerical labels. Color choice follows chromatic perceptual salience for fast positive/negative differentiation.
